Text:
Hoping to save frustration for some due to the vagueness of the serial instructions; and this is not a reflection on polisdavid as ALL versions of this torrent contain the same instructions, the statement "put the application by Show info on "open in 32-bits modus" is a "OS X" Finder function, it has nothing to do with the internal functions of AutoPano Giga:

Locate AutopanoGiga.app in Finder and right click, 
select "Get Info" 
select "open in 32-bits mode"

Now start the program and enter the serial info.

You do not need to use this in 32 bit mode.
It runs as well in 64.
The problem is that this should be a beta,
its full of bugs and crashes a lot.
Try and use Autopano Giga 2.0.9 which is at the moment much more stable.
Apart from the crashes Autopano is a fantastic tool.
Thanks
It work great fro me at 64 bits
Can you get the panotourpro serial ?
